1621510.name: iTop Screen Recorder PRO
1621510.description:
iTop Screen Recorder for Steam

iTop Screen Recorder PRO is an easy-to-use PC screen recorder. With no dropped frames and high FPS, it helps you effortlessly capture high-definition and professional-quality videos. In addition, it comes equipped with a suite of new, useful tools. This makes it perfect for recording fast-paced games.

High-quality & Lag-free Recording

· Capture any part of your screen easily and quickly, even the iPhone/Android screen

· Record YouTube videos, movies, live streaming and tutorial videos in 4K resolution

· Support record screen with audio and webcam at the same time. Both internal and external

webcam and microphone are supported

· Record your gaming highlight moment with no lags and fps drop

· Record with no watermarks & no time limits

· Add customized text or image watermarks

Easy Video Editing Software for Everyone

· Import and edit multiple video & audio tracks in one shot

· Add transitions, effects, filters to make better storytelling

· Eliminate any noise in your gaming recording videos and audios

· Export 4K footage to any platform. Share your creativity

More Useful Features

· Take high-quality screenshots while gameplay

· Turn text into lifelike speech with 50+ Al voices across multiple languages

· Convert eBooks (PDF/EPUB) of unlimited length into AI-powered speech.

· Add mosaic blur during recording

· Remove or replace background from image with the Al-powered BG remover

· Make blurry images and videos clear in 1-click with AI

· Reduce the file size of videos/recordings to 30%, 50%, 70% without compromising quality

· Automatically start and stop recording on schedule

Lifetime License

The license codes of iTop Screen Recorder for Steam are Lifetime / PC. You pay for the program only the first time and enjoy all updates & supports within version v6 for FREE and for a lifetime.

To See Clearly the Differences Between Free and PRO
1621510.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
